name: SpaceShip Titanic Preprocessing

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build-and-push:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Check out repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Conda environment from conda.yaml
        uses: conda-incubator/setup-miniconda@v3
        with:
          auto-update-conda: true
          python-version: "3.12.7"
          environment-file: labs/preprocessing/conda.yaml
          activate-environment: mlflow-env

      - name: Run MLflow project
        shell: bash -l {0}
        env:
          DAGSHUB_USER_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.DAGSHUB_USER_TOKEN }}
          DAGSHUB_USERNAME: ${{ secrets.DAGSHUB_USERNAME }}
          MLFLOW_TRACKING_USERNAME: ${{ secrets.DAGSHUB_USERNAME }}
          MLFLOW_TRACKING_PASSWORD: ${{ secrets.DAGSHUB_USER_TOKEN }}
        run: |
          cd labs/preprocessing
          mlflow run . \
            --env-manager=local

      - name: List mlruns directory
        working-directory: ./labs/preprocessing
        run: |
          ls -R mlruns

      - name: Get latest MLflow run_id
        id: get_run_id
        working-directory: ./labs/preprocessing
        run: |
          RUN_ID=$(ls -td mlruns/*/*/ | head -n 1 | cut -d'/' -f3)
          if [ -z "$RUN_ID" ]; then
            echo "Error: Tidak dapat menemukan MLflow run ID."
            exit 1
          fi
          echo "RUN_ID=$RUN_ID" >> $GITHUB_ENV
          echo "Run ID ditemukan: $RUN_ID"
      
      - name: Download All MLflow Artifacts
        working-directory: ./labs/preprocessing
        shell: bash -l {0}
        run: |
          mkdir -p artifacts
          mlflow artifacts download --run-id ${{ env.RUN_ID }} -d ./artifacts

      - name: Log in to Docker Hub
        uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with:
          username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_HUB_ACCESS_TOKEN }}

      - name: Build and Push Single Docker Image
        working-directory: ./labs/preprocessing
        run: |
          docker build -t learnalytica_preprocessor .
          docker tag learnalytica_preprocessor ${{ secrets.DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME }}/learnalytica_preprocessor:latest
          docker push ${{ secrets.DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME }}/learnalytica_preprocessor:latest
